item.title: Report X-2024020716
item.description:
Report X-2024020716

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-26T15:11:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-26
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was damaged and leaking. Manager brought package to QA. Leaking package was inspected then placed inside a plastic bag inside a hazmat drum. DescribePack: Package was leaking from a loose cap. No holes or cracks were in package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately transported to QA and promptly inspected. Using gloves the package was then placed in a hazmat drum.
